>>> "Ray Ormond" 07/23/2019 11:46 >>> Lamine - The memo is very confusing. Please draft an email of his actions and current status. Also include what plans were in motion to move him to a GP unit. It will nee
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content appears to be related to an individual named Epstein and their status within a correctional facility. The email chain includes discussions about drafting an email regarding Epstein's actions and plans to move him to a GP unit.
